languages.text: "Следы древней культуры, обнаруженной в слоях почвы, указывали на существование примитивных солярных верований среди темных обитателей этого мира. Верований, поразительно напоминающих поклонение Архиврагу. Судя по сохранившимся свиткам, шаманы использовали дары Хаоса, чтобы оберегать свой народ, обеспечивать урожай, наделять своих воинов силой и витальностью... и эта культура просуществовала тысячи лет!"

"The traces of the ancient culture uncovered in the layers of soil suggested the existence of primitive solar faiths among the dark inhabitants of this world. Faiths that are strikingly similar to worship of the Archenemy. The surviving scrolls indicate that shamans used the gifts of Chaos to protect their people, to secure the harvest, to imbue their warriors with strength and vitality... and that this culture persisted for thousands of years!"
languages.original_text: "Следы древней культуры, обнаруженной в слоях почвы, указывали на существование примитивных солярных верований среди темных обитателей этого мира. Верований, поразительно напоминающих поклонение Архиврагу. Судя по сохранившимся свиткам, шаманы использовали дары Хаоса, чтобы оберегать свой народ, обеспечивать урожай, наделять своих воинов силой и витальностью... и эта культура просуществовала тысячи лет!"

traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: “我们在土层中发现了古代文明的痕迹。这些痕迹表明，这个世界的古老居民曾拥有原始的太阳信仰，这些信仰与对混沌大敌的崇拜极为相似。残存的卷轴表明，那些萨满曾利用混沌的馈赠来保护他们的人民，确保作物丰收，为战士们提供力量与活力……这样的传统延续了几千年！”
languages.original_text: "The traces of the ancient culture uncovered in the layers of soil suggested the existence of primitive solar faiths among the dark inhabitants of this world. Faiths that are strikingly similar to worship of the Archenemy. The surviving scrolls indicate that shamans used the gifts of Chaos to protect their people, to secure the harvest, to imbue their warriors with strength and vitality... and that this culture persisted for thousands of years!"

traits.locale_text: “我们在土层中发现了古代文明的痕迹。这些痕迹表明，这个世界的古老居民曾拥有原始的太阳信仰，这些信仰与对混沌大敌的崇拜极为相似。残存的卷轴表明，那些萨满曾利用混沌的馈赠来保护他们的人民，确保作物丰收，为战士们提供力量与活力……这样的传统延续了几千年！”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Los rastros de la cultura antigua que descubrí en las capas de tierra sugerían la existencia de religiones solares primitivas entre los oscuros habitantes de este mundo. Religiones con similitudes sorprendentes al culto al Archienemigo. Los pergaminos que hemos recuperado indican que los chamanes utilizaban los dones del Caos para proteger a su gente, asegurar su cosecha, proporcionar fuerza y vitalidad a sus guerreros... ¡y su cultura sobrevivió durante miles de años!».
languages.original_text: "The traces of the ancient culture uncovered in the layers of soil suggested the existence of primitive solar faiths among the dark inhabitants of this world. Faiths that are strikingly similar to worship of the Archenemy. The surviving scrolls indicate that shamans used the gifts of Chaos to protect their people, to secure the harvest, to imbue their warriors with strength and vitality... and that this culture persisted for thousands of years!"

traits.locale_text: «Los rastros de la cultura antigua que descubrí en las capas de tierra sugerían la existencia de religiones solares primitivas entre los oscuros habitantes de este mundo. Religiones con similitudes sorprendentes al culto al Archienemigo. Los pergaminos que hemos recuperado indican que los chamanes utilizaban los dones del Caos para proteger a su gente, asegurar su cosecha, proporcionar fuerza y vitalidad a sus guerreros... ¡y su cultura sobrevivió durante miles de años!».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「土の層で発見された古代文化の痕跡は、この世界の闇の住人たちの中に原始的な太陽信仰が存在することを示唆していた。その信仰は仇敵への崇拝と驚くほど似ている。残存する巻物は、シャーマンが混沌の賜物を利用したことを示している」 人々を守り、収穫を確保し、戦士たちに力と活力を吹き込むため…そしてこの文化は何千年も存続したのです！」
languages.original_text: "The traces of the ancient culture uncovered in the layers of soil suggested the existence of primitive solar faiths among the dark inhabitants of this world. Faiths that are strikingly similar to worship of the Archenemy. The surviving scrolls indicate that shamans used the gifts of Chaos to protect their people, to secure the harvest, to imbue their warriors with strength and vitality... and that this culture persisted for thousands of years!"

traits.locale_text: 「土の層で発見された古代文化の痕跡は、この世界の闇の住人たちの中に原始的な太陽信仰が存在することを示唆していた。その信仰は仇敵への崇拝と驚くほど似ている。残存する巻物は、シャーマンが混沌の賜物を利用したことを示している」 人々を守り、収穫を確保し、戦士たちに力と活力を吹き込むため…そしてこの文化は何千年も存続したのです！」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Les vestiges de la culture disparue que nous avons déterrés suggèrent l'existence de religions solaires primitives parmi les sombres habitants de ce monde, des religions très similaires au culte du Grand Ennemi. Les parchemins que nous avons retrouvés indiquent que les chamans utilisaient les dons du Chaos pour protéger leur peuple, garantir de bonnes récoltes, donner force et vitalité à leurs guerriers... Ils nous ont également appris que cette culture avait perduré pendant des millénaires ! »
languages.original_text: "The traces of the ancient culture uncovered in the layers of soil suggested the existence of primitive solar faiths among the dark inhabitants of this world. Faiths that are strikingly similar to worship of the Archenemy. The surviving scrolls indicate that shamans used the gifts of Chaos to protect their people, to secure the harvest, to imbue their warriors with strength and vitality... and that this culture persisted for thousands of years!"

traits.locale_text: « Les vestiges de la culture disparue que nous avons déterrés suggèrent l'existence de religions solaires primitives parmi les sombres habitants de ce monde, des religions très similaires au culte du Grand Ennemi. Les parchemins que nous avons retrouvés indiquent que les chamans utilisaient les dons du Chaos pour protéger leur peuple, garantir de bonnes récoltes, donner force et vitalité à leurs guerriers... Ils nous ont également appris que cette culture avait perduré pendant des millénaires ! »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Die im Boden entdeckten Spuren der alten Kultur deuteten auf einen primitiven Sonnenglauben bei den früheren Bewohnern dieser Welt hin. Dieser Glaube ist der Verehrung des Erzfeinds erstaunlich ähnlich. Den noch bestehenden Schriftrollen zufolge schützten Schamanen ihr Volk mit den Gaben des Chaos, sie sicherten die Ernte, verliehen ihren Kriegern Stärke und Lebenskraft ... und die Kultur bestand über mehrere Jahrtausende!"
languages.original_text: "The traces of the ancient culture uncovered in the layers of soil suggested the existence of primitive solar faiths among the dark inhabitants of this world. Faiths that are strikingly similar to worship of the Archenemy. The surviving scrolls indicate that shamans used the gifts of Chaos to protect their people, to secure the harvest, to imbue their warriors with strength and vitality... and that this culture persisted for thousands of years!"

traits.locale_text: "Die im Boden entdeckten Spuren der alten Kultur deuteten auf einen primitiven Sonnenglauben bei den früheren Bewohnern dieser Welt hin. Dieser Glaube ist der Verehrung des Erzfeinds erstaunlich ähnlich. Den noch bestehenden Schriftrollen zufolge schützten Schamanen ihr Volk mit den Gaben des Chaos, sie sicherten die Ernte, verliehen ihren Kriegern Stärke und Lebenskraft ... und die Kultur bestand über mehrere Jahrtausende!"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Toprak tabakalarında açığa çıkarılan kadim kültürün izleri, bu dünyanın karanlık halkı arasında; Şerbaşı'nın inancına çarpıcı derecede benzeyen, ilkel güneş inançlarına mensup kimselerin varlığını işaret ediyordu. Sağlam kalmış tomarlar; şamanların halklarını korumak, hasadın verimli geçmesini sağlamak ve savaşçılara güç ile dirayet aşılamak için Kaos'un armağanlarını kullandığını işaret ediyor. Üstelik bu kültür, binlerce yıl var olmuş!"
languages.original_text: "The traces of the ancient culture uncovered in the layers of soil suggested the existence of primitive solar faiths among the dark inhabitants of this world. Faiths that are strikingly similar to worship of the Archenemy. The surviving scrolls indicate that shamans used the gifts of Chaos to protect their people, to secure the harvest, to imbue their warriors with strength and vitality... and that this culture persisted for thousands of years!"

traits.locale_text: "Toprak tabakalarında açığa çıkarılan kadim kültürün izleri, bu dünyanın karanlık halkı arasında ilkel güneş inançlarının varlığına işaret ediyor. Şerbaşı'na tapınmaya çarpıcı derecede benzeyen inançların. Sağlam kalmış tomarlar, şamanların, halklarını korumak, hasatın verimli olmasını sağlamak ve savaşçılarına güç ve dirayet aşılamak için Kaos'un armağanlarını kullandığına işaret ediyor. Ve bu kültür binlerce yıl boyunca hayatta kalmış!"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
